# shiny.plague

This is an exercise on how to develop a game mostly using Shiny. It is a shiny application structured as an R package, following the [golem](https://github.com/ThinkR-open/golem) framework.

## Get Started

First, we'll need to install all the necessary libraries. A complete list can be found in the `DESCRIPTION` file. But it's just easier if you install the development version of the app and follow the instructions to install all dependencies.

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("aljrico/shiny-plague")
```
